task.title: Testing the connections
task.shortdesc: When the application server restarts, test the connections.

step.cmd: Browse to Resources JDBC Data Sources .
Check curamdb DataSource and/or curamsibdb DataSource check box.
The following messages are displayed if successful:

info.msgblock: Test Connection for DataSource <DataSource name> on server <server name> at node <node name> was successful.

step.cmd: Check the logs for details of the failure, correct, and retry.
